downloadDescription:
This package contains an implementation of the "Decision Tree Fields" framework, described in the ICCV 2011 paper "Decision Tree Fields" by Nowozin, Rother, Bagon, Yao, Sharp, and Kohli.
The DTF package allows training and testing of computer vision models for image labelling tasks such as image segmentation and semantic scene labelling. Last published: October 26, 2012.
detailsSection:
This package contains an implementation of the "Decision Tree Fields" framework, described in the ICCV 2011 paper "Decision Tree Fields" by Nowozin, Rother, Bagon, Yao, Sharp, and Kohli.
The DTF package allows training and testing of computer vision models for image labelling tasks such as image segmentation and semantic scene labelling.
